name: Tile Typer
description:
Test your fingers with this simple score chasing game. The basics are simple: there is one correct tile, press the correct key corresponding to it.

There are two main mods: Stamina and Speed.
In Stamina mode, the goal is to never miss a tile, the game is over. Every time you correctly type the tile, you gain a second. How long can you be accurate?
In Speed mode, the goal is to be fast without missing a tile. Get to a specified number of tiles and check your score. Can you beat your previous scores?
